table.name: civicrm_menu
table.comment: Table to store menu items for all civicrm components.

field.name: domain_id
field.title: Domain
field.comment: Which Domain is this menu item for

field.name: path
field.title: Path
field.comment: Path Name

field.name: path_arguments
field.title: Arguments
field.comment: Arguments to pass to the url

field.name: access_callback
field.title: Access Callback
field.comment: Function to call to check access permissions

field.name: access_arguments
field.title: Access Arguments
field.comment: Arguments to pass to access callback

field.name: page_callback
field.title: Page Callback
field.comment: function to call for this url

field.name: page_arguments
field.title: Page Arguments
field.comment: Arguments to pass to page callback

field.name: breadcrumb
field.title: Breadcrumb
field.comment: Breadcrumb for the path.

field.name: return_url
field.comment: Url where a page should redirected to, if next url not known.

field.name: return_url_args
field.comment: Arguments to pass to return_url

field.name: component_id
field.title: Component
field.comment: Component that this menu item belongs to

field.name: is_active
field.title: Enabled?
field.comment: Is this menu item active?

field.name: is_public
field.title: Public?
field.comment: Is this menu accessible to the public?

field.name: is_exposed
field.title: Exposed?
field.comment: Is this menu exposed to the navigation system?

field.name: is_ssl
field.title: Use SSL?
field.comment: Should this menu be exposed via SSL if enabled?

field.name: weight
field.title: Order
field.comment: Ordering of the menu items in various blocks.

field.name: type
field.title: Type
field.comment: Drupal menu type.

field.name: page_type
field.title: Page Type
field.comment: CiviCRM menu type.

field.name: skipBreadcrumb
field.title: Hide Breadcrumb?
field.comment: skip this url being exposed to breadcrumb

field.name: module_data
field.title: Other menu data
field.comment: All other menu metadata not stored in other fields
